title: Patching Error 004
body: Everytime I restart client it says [this](https://gyazo.com/b57c4e0be20eb9c18cbdf0e4d22e7cd0), and restarted pc. Tried to full repair and said it failed.

replies.body: It works for a couple of people but try Hexpatch. It didn't work for me but a couple of hours ago my friend used it and it worked.
At what percentage is the patcher failing? There can be a couple different causes for this, and I'll be able to give better context once I know when exactly it's giving you that error.
I'm getting that error now. It begins immediately upon launch of the client.
